RingC1Page.intro.title: HeyTCM C1 Smart Health Ring
RingC1Page.intro.subtitle: Fusing TCM wisdom with modern technology, start a new data wellness experience.

RingC1Page.features.title: Intelligent TCM Health Management
RingC1Page.features.desc: Integrates TCM theory and modern sensor technology for real-time health data monitoring and intelligent constitution/trend analysis.

RingC1Page.features.title: Multi-dimensional Data Collection
RingC1Page.features.desc: Supports collection of heart rate, temperature, sleep, activity, and more for personalized wellness.

RingC1Page.features.title: AI-assisted Decision Making
RingC1Page.features.desc: Built-in AI algorithms provide personalized health advice and TCM conditioning plans.

RingC1Page.faqs.q: Who is the C1 ring suitable for?
RingC1Page.faqs.a: It is suitable for those who care about health and want to use data for wellness, especially TCM enthusiasts.

RingC1Page.faqs.q: How to purchase the C1 ring?
RingC1Page.faqs.a: You can reserve or purchase through the HeyTCM official website or partner channels.
